TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CursorConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 在 对象与其他类型之间进行转换。

span.span: Converts a object to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用于以下两种模式： 指定标准光标 (其中一个的静态常数名称) 或指定的文件名称。 works for two modes: specifying a standard cursor (one of the static constant names of ) or specifying a file name. 命名的文件必须为`.cur`或`.ani`由扩展名标识的文件。The named file must be a `.cur` or `.ani` file identified by extension. 请参阅[如何： 更改的游标类型](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-change-the-cursor-type.md)。See [How to: Change the Cursor Type](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-change-the-cursor-type.md).
